ISSUE.TITLE: Display the version at the bottom of the navigation sidebar
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### NetBox version v4.2.8 ### Feature type Data model extension ### Proposed functionality Move the version from the right side of the page footer to the bottom of the navigation menu. ### Use case The NetBox version is frequently referenced for myriad reasons, and is currently accessible only at the very end of each page. Moving it to the navigation sidebar ensures that the release info is always immediately available. ### Database changes _No response_ ### External dependencies _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #19167: Update REST API examples (#19353) * Closes #19167: Update REST API examples * Fix missing description --------- Co-authored-by: Markku Leini√∂ <markkuleinio@users.noreply.github.com>
